statements: SELECT * FROM energy_storage;
SELECT id, system_name, efficiency FROM energy_storage;
SELECT system_name, storage_capacity FROM energy_storage ORDER BY efficiency DESC;
SELECT * FROM energy_storage WHERE location='California';
SELECT system_name, storage_capacity, efficiency FROM energy_storage WHERE storage_capacity > 100 ORDER BY efficiency ASC;
SELECT * FROM energy_storage WHERE storage_capacity > 1000 AND efficiency < 0.8
SELECT id, system_name, storage_capacity FROM energy_storage WHERE location = 'New York' ORDER BY storage_capacity DESC
SELECT system_name, location FROM energy_storage WHERE efficiency > 0.9 ORDER BY location ASC
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_systems, AVG(storage_capacity) AS avg_capacity FROM energy_storage WHERE location IS NOT NULL
SELECT * FROM energy_storage WHERE system_name LIKE 'ABC%'
SELECT * FROM energy_storage_systems;
SELECT system_name, capacity FROM energy_storage_systems ORDER BY capacity DESC;
SELECT system_name, efficiency FROM energy_storage_systems WHERE efficiency > 0.8;
SELECT id, system_name FROM energy_storage_systems WHERE capacity >= 1000 ORDER BY id;
SELECT * FROM energy_consumption_logs WHERE date_timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT system_name, capacity, efficiency FROM energy_storage_systems WHERE id = 1;
SELECT system_name, capacity, efficiency FROM energy_storage_systems WHERE id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT * FROM energy_storage_systems WHERE capacity > 1000 ORDER BY system_name ASC;

SELECT system_name, SUM(energy_consumed) AS total_energy_consumed FROM energy_storage_systems JOIN energy_consumption_logs ON energy_storage_systems.id = energy_consumption_logs.system_id GROUP BY system_name;

SELECT system_name, energy_consumed, date_timestamp FROM energy_storage_systems JOIN energy_consumption_logs ON energy_storage_systems.id = energy_consumption_logs.system_id WHERE energy_consumed > 500 ORDER BY date_timestamp DESC;
SELECT id, system_name, capacity, efficiency FROM EnergyStorageSystems;
SELECT * FROM EnergyStorageSystems ORDER BY capacity DESC;
SELECT system_name, efficiency FROM EnergyStorageSystems WHERE capacity > 1000;
SELECT system_name, stored_energy FROM EnergyStorageSystems WHERE efficiency > 0.85 ORDER BY system_name ASC;
SELECT system_name, produced_energy + consumed_energy AS net_energy FROM EnergyProduction JOIN EnergyConsumption ON EnergyProduction.system_id = EnergyConsumption.system_id;
SELECT * FROM EnergyStorageSystems;
SELECT system_name, capacity FROM EnergyStorageSystems ORDER BY capacity DESC;
SELECT system_name, capacity, efficiency FROM EnergyStorageSystems WHERE efficiency > 0.8;
SELECT es.system_name, ec.timestamp, ec.consumed_energy FROM EnergyStorageSystems es JOIN EnergyConsumption ec ON es.id = ec.system_id;
SELECT ep.system_id, ep.timestamp, ep.produced_energy, es.system_name FROM EnergyProduction ep JOIN EnergyStorageSystems es ON ep.system_id = es.id ORDER BY ep.timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM energy_storage_systems;
SELECT id, type FROM energy_storage_systems WHERE capacity > 1000;
SELECT location FROM energy_storage_systems WHERE type = 'battery' ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT * FROM energy_consumption WHERE consumption BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT system_id, SUM(production) AS total_production FROM energy_production GROUP BY system_id HAVING total_production > 5000;
SELECT * FROM energy_storage_systems ORDER BY capacity DESC;
SELECT id, type, location FROM energy_storage_systems WHERE type = 'Battery';
SELECT system_id, timestamp, consumption FROM energy_consumption WHERE consumption > 100 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT system_id, SUM(production) AS total_production FROM energy_production GROUP BY system_id HAVING total_production > 500;
SELECT eo.id, eo.optimization_type, e.id AS optimization_id FROM energy_optimization AS eo JOIN energy_production AS e ON eo.optimization_id = e.id;
SELECT * FROM EnergyStorageSystems;
SELECT location, capacity FROM EnergyStorageSystems ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT system_id, energy_consumed FROM EnergyConsumption WHERE energy_consumed > 100;
SELECT system_id, energy_produced FROM EnergyProduction WHERE system_id = 2;
SELECT system_id, optimization_metric FROM EnergyOptimization WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01';
SELECT * FROM EnergyStorageSystems ORDER BY capacity DESC;
SELECT location, efficiency FROM EnergyStorageSystems WHERE location LIKE '%USA%' ORDER BY efficiency ASC;
SELECT system_id, energy_produced, timestamp FROM EnergyProduction WHERE energy_produced > 1000 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT id, log_description FROM MaintenanceLogs WHERE log_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY id;
SELECT system_id, SUM(energy_consumed) AS total_energy_consumed FROM EnergyConsumption GROUP BY system_id HAVING total_energy_consumed > 5000 ORDER BY total_energy_consumed DESC;
